11   | 
12   | #ifndef BYTE
13   | #define BYTE unsigned char
14   | #endif
15   | 
16   | 
17   | int get_con_data (RINGBUF *ringbuf);		/*+ Pointer to ringbuf +*/
18   | 
19   | int get_telnet_data (RINGBUF *ringbuf, int tn_sock);		/*+ Pointer to ringbuf +*/
20   | 
21   | int telnet_srv_init(char *port);		/*+ Port nr to listen on +*/
22   | 
23   | void tn_close(int socket);				/*+ Close telnet socket +*/
24   | 
25   | int check_conn_request(); 	/*+ Check for incoming connection requests +*/
26   | 
27   | int get_telnet_sock(void);  /*+ Get current telnet socket number +*/
28   | 
29   | int get_listen_sock(void);  /*+ Get current telnet listen socket +*/
30   | 
31   | void send_telnet_data(BYTE *buf, int len);		/*+ Data to send +*/
32   | 
33   | void tn_close_all(void);		/*+ Close all open sockets +*/
34   | 
35   | void tn_printf(char *format, ...);   /*+ printf for the telnet connection +*/
36   |
